title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Self-Regulated Learning Management Strategies for MOOC Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and foundational knowledge of language learning
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can establish weekly learning objectives and detailed action plans in a MOOC environment.
Learners can manage their study schedules by utilizing mobile device-based time management tools (checklists, notifications, etc.).
Learners can effectively utilize materials provided in the LMS (videos, PDFs, etc.) to engage in self-directed learning.
Learners can practice sharing learning resources and exchanging feedback through peer evaluation systems and online forums.
Learners can understand the navigation structure of the MOOC platform and complete over 80% of learning activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
